divs: Sighting DetailsI saw helicopters chasing the quick flashing sphere shaped lights. I was on my front porch looking up at the sky. My friend across town called me to witness it and I went out on the porch because I was curious. I felt weird and I went in because my children were scared.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Rockingham
There were no other sightings in Rockingham on or around September 15th 2010
